8:30 AM - 9:15 AM

Check-in, Breakfast & Networking


9:15 AM - 10:00 AM

Can Cooperative Guidelines Lead To True Efficiency?


Members of AICP’s leadership and production executives from Leo Burnett discuss the benefits of laying out the “terms of engagement” on the table as transparent business practices. Panelists Include:

Vincent Geraghty
• Executive VP/Executive Director of Production, Leo Burnett

Eriks Krumins
• Executive Producer, Gorgeous

Jerry Solomon
• Managing Partner, Persuade Content

Matt Miller
• President/CEO of The AICP



10:00 AM - 10:15 AM

Coffee Break (featuring premium Hawaiian coffee)



10:15 AM - 11:00 AM

The State of Production Insurance. Are you covered or exposed?


From Wrap-up to E&O, everyone needs to be a risk management specialist these days. ProSight Specialty Insurance will host a discussion with other insurance experts regarding the complexities that lurk behind every set. Panelists include:

Joe Finnegan
• President of Program Underwriting, ProSight Specialty Insurance

A. LeConte Moore
• Managing Director, DeWitt Stern

Scott Taylor
• President, Taylor & Taylor

Matt Miller
• President/CEO of The AICP



11:15 AM - 12:00 PM

Can you say “Lawsuit”? Everyone Else Can…


Some of the best "Legal Eagles" in the industry discuss the parameters of what everyone needs to know regarding intellectual property, copyright, trademarks and patents in today’s litigious media business. Get out your notebooks and take some tips from the following experts:

Tamany Bentz
• Attorney, Venable

Jeffrey Greenbaum
• Managing Partner, Frankfurt Kurnit Klein & Selz

Brendan McFeely
• Senior Associate, Kane Kessler
